description: Adsorption & Materials Research Group (AMRG) is a research group that specializes in the synthesis and design of porous materials for gas separation and catalyst. Our team of expert researchers is dedicated to advancing the field of adsorption and materials research through innovative initiatives and groundbreaking discoveries. We work with a diverse range of clients, including academic institutions, government agencies, and private companies, to provide customized solutions to their unique needs.
